data.title: The Poison Belt
data.meta_description: London: Hodder and Stoughton, 1912 . First edition. Hardcover. Near fine. Item #22051 8vo. Blue textured cloth printed in gilt and black on the spine, and in black on the upper board. Spine lightly sunned else a very good copy. Bookplate on front pastedown.Green A38..
data.text:
Doyle, A. Conan

London: Hodder and Stoughton, (1912). First edition. Hardcover. Near fine. Item #22051

8vo. Blue textured cloth printed in gilt and black on the spine, and in black on the upper board. Spine lightly sunned else a very good copy. Bookplate on front pastedown.

Green A38.

.
